Detailed Description

This class is used to manage the various stages of logging into the server.

This covers logging into both the loginapp and the baseapp.

void LoginHandler::addChildRequest ( RetryingRequestPtr  pRequest  ) 

This method add a RetryingRequest to this LoginHandler.

void LoginHandler::addCondemnedInterface ( Mercury::NetworkInterface *  pInterface  ) 

This method adds a condemned network interface to this LoginHandler.

This is used by BaseAppLoginRequests to clean up their network interfaces as they are unable to do it themselves.

void LoginHandler::onBaseAppReply ( BaseAppLoginRequestPtr  pHandler,
SessionKey  sessionKey 
)

This method is called when a reply to baseAppLogin is received from the BaseApp (or an exception occurred - likely a timeout).

The first successful reply wins and we do not care about the rest.

void LoginHandler::onFailure ( Mercury::Reason  reason  ) 

This method handles a network level failure.

void LoginHandler::onLoginReply ( BinaryIStream &  data  ) 

This method handles the login reply message from the LoginApp.

const LoginReplyRecord& LoginHandler::replyRecord (  )  const [inline]

void LoginHandler::sendBaseAppLogin (  ) 

This method sends a login request to the BaseApp.

There can be multiple login requests outstanding at any given time (sent from different sockets). Only one will win.

void LoginHandler::sendLoginAppLogin (  ) 

This method sends the login request to the server.
